item.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
item.description: Vincent Chan, 45, admits multiple offences including assault by penetration.

item.title: Salford Red Devils wound up by High Court over debts
item.description: Troubled former Super League club Salford Red Devils are wound up by the High Court.

item.title: Success in 2025 - are the Lionesses ready for 2026?
item.description: England cap off a successful 2025 with two resounding victories over China and Ghana at home - so what shape are they in for World Cup qualification?

item.title: William and Catherine greet German president on first state visit in 27 years
item.description: Germany's president will receive a ceremonial welcome from the King and a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

item.title: 'Only win will do in biggest Test of Bazball era'
item.description: England cannot mathematically lose the Ashes in Brisbane, but a 2-0 deficit would mean the urn is as good as gone - this is the biggest Test of the Ba...
